pages.text: $(o)Goblins lives over the Overworld in camps formed by small groups with what few materials and food they can get, due to their low intelligence.$(br2)$(o)There is a rumor that there is a Goblin Keep ruled by a greedy and cowardly King who was able to manipulate the Strongest Goblin to serve him.
$(o)They will be forced to guard all his treasures and protecting his life from all possible intruders for the rest of their miserable life.
